attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is cursed. I tried to download it and it asks many very personal questions then this awful music played the entire time it was downloading which took forever and made my phone completely unusable. I think itâ€™s a Russian spy app because as soon as the app FINALLY downloaded a man called speaking in Russian then proceeded to ask about emails and someone named sleepy joe. I told him I didnâ€™t know anyone by the name of joe personally but I would be voting for a man named joe because this guy in the presidents office now is a total ass clown. He started screaming at me telling me that Russian troll farms were going to flood my social media with ads and propaganda to brainwash me and that after I would join in yelling and whining about wearing a mask and chanting make America great again. I was deeply confused as America is an entire continent and there is both a north and a south so I wasnâ€™t sure what he was getting at but I knew that this was some kind of low grade psychological warfare. Unfortunately it has worked on some unintelligent primitive simple minded people because I have seen people wearing t-shirts and waving flags with that exact slogan. Anyway to make a long story short this app is really bad! The Russian man said he knew where I lived and had all my data to track my social media habits and that they would act accordingly. All this for a stupid app and it didnâ€™t even have games ğŸ¤¬ Also the man had me so distracted that I burnt my quesadilla and now Iâ€™m hungry. Screw this app and F.D.T ğŸ™ƒ
